import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export default function UserProfile() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const userInfo = useSelector((state) => state.user.userInfo); const [selectedEditIndex, setSelectedEditIndex] = useState(-1); const [showAddAddressForm, setShowAddAddressForm] = useState(false); return (

Name: {userInfo.name ? userInfo.name : 'New User'}

email address : {userInfo.email}

{userInfo.role === 'admin' && (

role : {userInfo.role}

)}
{showAddAddressForm ? (
{ console.log(data); handleAdd(data); reset(); })} >

Personal Information

Use a permanent address where you can receive mail.

{errors.name && (

{errors.name.message}

)}
{errors.email && (

{errors.email.message}

)}
{errors.phone && (

{errors.phone.message}

)}
{errors.street && (

{errors.street.message}

)}
{errors.city && (

{errors.city.message}

)}
{errors.state && (

{errors.state.message}

)}
{errors.pinCode && (

{errors.pinCode.message}

)}
) : null}

Your Addresses :

{userInfo.addresses.map((address, index) => (
{selectedEditIndex === index ? (
{ console.log(data); handleEdit(data, index); reset(); })} >

Personal Information

Use a permanent address where you can receive mail.

)}

)}

)}

)}
{errors.pinCode && (

{errors.pinCode.message}

)}
) : null}

{address.name}

{address.street}

{address.pinCode}

Phone: {address.phone}

{address.city}

))}
) };
